msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kollesis near the left edge. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)

Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Aunes, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)

Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Maron, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 186)
Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: "[(Column) 21]:;Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day, drachmas 64, obols 27;;(Mecheir) 13 likewise: ;Horion, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, obols 28;;Anchorimphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Harsiesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Akoution, son of Heron, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tauris, guard tax, drachmas 8;;Ptollas, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 12;;Heras, brother, with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Agathopous, slave of Thermouthis alias Tpaietis, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Chairemon, grandson of Horos, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 76, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 14:;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas, 8;;Heraklas, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas Petheus, grandson of Aunes, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Horos, grandson of Horos, mother Taharmothes, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 48, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 15 likewise:;Komon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollautis, drachmas 8;;Sisois, son of Limnaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, drachmas grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Paouetis, son of Petheus, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 84, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 16 likewise:;Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetesouchos, obols drachmas 20, obols 26."
